attributes.action: Bring back the Death Sentence for Child abusers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently we have hears of the deaths of two young children, Leticia Aaliyah Wright and an un-named 17 month old baby boy who suffered grotesque cruelty at the hands of their parents/guardians.  We can not sit idly by and allow this cruelty to continue unabated.  Those who abuse defenceless children, sexually and physically, to their deaths must be punished in the severest way.  As a democratic and civilised nation we must not allow this to go on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
